org.lenskit.api

Interface ItemBasedItemScorer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractItemBasedItemScorer, ItemItemItemBasedItemScorer

    public interface ItemBasedItemScorer

    Score items with reference to specified item(s). These scores can be predicted relevance scores, purchase probabilities, or any other real-valued score which can be assigned to an item relative to a given item. This interface is distinguished from ItemScorer in that it uses a set of reference items instead of a user as the basis for computing scores.

    Compatibility
    Public

    • Method Detail

      • scoreRelatedItem

        Result scoreRelatedItem(@Nonnull
                        Collection<Long> basket,
                        long item)

        Score a single item based on a collection of items (e.g. a shopping basket).

        Parameters:
        basket - The objective items ID used as the query
        item - The item ID to score.
        Returns:
        The relevance score, or null if no score can be predicted.

      • scoreRelatedItems

        @Nonnull
Map<Long,Double> scoreRelatedItems(@Nonnull
                                             Collection<Long> basket,
                                             @Nonnull
                                             Collection<Long> items)

        Score a collection of items based on a collection of items (e.g. a shopping basket).

        Parameters:
        basket - The objective items ID used as the query
        items - The list of items to score.
        Returns:
        A mapping from item IDs to relevance scores. This mapping may not contain all requested items.

      • scoreRelatedItemsWithDetails

        ResultMap scoreRelatedItemsWithDetails(@Nonnull
                                       Collection<Long> basket,
                                       Collection<Long> items)

        Score a collection of items based on a collection of items (e.g. a shopping basket), with details.

        Parameters:
        basket - The items to use as the query.
        items - The items to score.
        Returns:
        The scores for the items, possibly with additional details (will be represented as a subclass of Result.
